dmca.title: [EV1-C2409729U] Spam Abuse Report: Please View Immediately
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 03, 2007 6:57 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2409729U] Spam Abuse Report: Please View Immediately

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

MIME element (text/plain)
----- Forwarded Message ----
From: Steve Wiideman <steve@stevewiideman.com>
To: dimitris <dps90212@yahoo.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 3, 2007 8:54:54 AM
Subject: Spam Abuse Report: Please View Immediately 
 
 
Send to abuse@theplanet.com 
  
RE: www.wheeljungle.com, IP 74.52.68.22 
  
To Whom It May Concern, 
  
I am the CEO of SpoiledCars.com, a large corporation based out of Beverly Hills,
California. My technical support team recently detected one of your clients abusing
content from our website, which has dramatically affected our search engine results.
The website is www.wheeljungle.com and the content being stolen can be found hidden
in the SOURCE CODE of this and many other web pages:
http://wheeljungle.com/aza_staggered_wheels.html. 
  
Because the owner has chosen to hide his contact information, we are currently
holding you responsible for the copyright infringement. You have 48 hours to take
action before our legal team does. Please understand that we are a web-based
business with most of our clients coming from the web; therefore we are losing tens
of thousands of dollars each day your client¢s site remains online. 
  
I can be reached directly at 310-980-2199. Please send us a confirmation the moment
the problem has been resolved. Thank you for your time and urgent attention to this
matter. 
  
Regards,
Dimitris
